import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faUpload } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import axios from 'axios'; import apiBasePath from './globalVars'; function EditAlbum() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState( { artist: null, title: null, genre: null, recordLabel: null, releaseDate: null, description: null, rating: null, coverImage: null } ); const handleChange = event => { setFormData( { ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value } ); }; useEffect( () => { console.log(formData) }, [formData] ) const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(apiBasePath + '/addalbum') console.log(formData) axios.post(apiBasePath + '/addalbum', formData) .then( res => { console.log(res); } ) .catch( err => { console.log(err); } ) .finally( () => { console.log('here'); } ) }; return ( <>
